channel.title: attack.t1012 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1012 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Azure AD Health Monitoring Agent Registry Keys Access
item.description: This detection uses Windows security events to detect suspicious access attempts to the registry key of Azure AD Health monitoring agent. This detection requires an access control entry (ACE) on the system access control list (SACL) of the following securable object HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft Online\Reporting\MonitoringAgent.

item.title: Azure AD Health Service Agents Registry Keys Access
item.description: This detection uses Windows security events to detect suspicious access attempts to the registry key values and sub-keys of Azure AD Health service agents (e.g AD FS). Information from AD Health service agents can be used to potentially abuse some of the features provided by those services in the cloud (e.g. Federation). This detection requires an access control entry (ACE) on the system access control list (SACL) of the following securable object: HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\ADHealthAgent. Make sure you set the SACL to propagate to its sub-keys.

item.title: Operation Wocao Activity
item.description: Detects activity mentioned in Operation Wocao report

item.title: SAM Registry Hive Handle Request
item.description: Detects handles requested to SAM registry hive

item.title: Query Registry
item.description: Adversaries may interact with the Windows Registry to gather information about the system, configuration, and installed software.

item.title: SysKey Registry Keys Access
item.description: Detects handle requests and access operations to specific registry keys to calculate the SysKey

item.title: Baby Shark Activity
item.description: Detects activity that could be related to Baby Shark malware

item.title: Exports Critical Registry Keys To a File
item.description: Detects the export of a crital Registry key to a file.

item.title: Exports Registry Key To a File
item.description: Detects the export of the target Registry key to a file.

item.title: Remote Registry Management Using Reg Utility
item.description: Remote registry management using REG utility from non-admin workstation
